#!/bin/bash
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_NAME" != *"git"* ]] && [[ "$CLAUDE_COMMAND" != *"git"* ]]; then exit 0; fi
if ! git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then exit 0; fi

# CRITICAL: Verify we're in the correct repository!
REPO_DIR=$(basename "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)")

# Only set remote if we're in the CORRECT repository
if [ "$REPO_DIR" != "globtimplots" ]; then
  # We're NOT in globtimplots - do NOT modify the remote!
  exit 0
fi

current_url=$(git remote get-url origin 2>/dev/null)
if [[ "$current_url" == git@git.mpi-cbg.de:globaloptim/globtimplots.git ]]; then
  # Already correct SSH - nothing to do
  exit 0
elif [[ "$current_url" == ssh://git.mpi-cbg.de/globaloptim/globtimplots.git ]]; then
  # SSH but wrong format - fix it
  echo "ðŸ”§ Fixing SSH URL format for globtimplots"
  git remote set-url origin "git@git.mpi-cbg.de:globaloptim/globtimplots.git"
  echo "âœ… Git remote configured correctly"
elif [ -f .env.gitlab.local ]; then
  source .env.gitlab.local
  if [[ "$current_url" != *"oauth2:"* ]]; then
    echo "ðŸ”§ Setting up OAuth2 authentication for globtimplots"
    git remote set-url origin "https://oauth2:${GITLAB_PRIVATE_TOKEN}@git.mpi-cbg.de/globaloptim/globtimplots.git"
    echo "âœ… Git remote configured for token authentication"
  fi
fi

#!/bin/bash
if ! git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then exit 0; fi

# CRITICAL: Verify we're in the correct repository!
REPO_DIR=$(basename "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)")

# Only proceed if we're in the CORRECT repository
if [ "$REPO_DIR" != "globtimplots" ]; then
  # We're NOT in globtimplots - do NOT auto-commit!
  exit 0
fi

git_status=$(git status --porcelain)
if [ -z "$git_status" ]; then exit 0; fi
file_count=$(echo "$git_status" | wc -l | tr -d ' ')
if [ "$file_count" -ge 5 ] || [[ "$CLAUDE_CONTEXT" == *"commit"* ]] || [[ "$CLAUDE_CONTEXT" == *"push"* ]]; then
  current_url=$(git remote get-url origin 2>/dev/null)
  if [[ "$current_url" == git@git.mpi-cbg.de:globaloptim/globtimplots.git ]]; then
    # Already correct SSH - nothing to do
    :
  elif [[ "$current_url" == ssh://git.mpi-cbg.de/globaloptim/globtimplots.git ]]; then
    # Fix SSH format
    git remote set-url origin "git@git.mpi-cbg.de:globaloptim/globtimplots.git"
  elif [ -f .env.gitlab.local ]; then
    source .env.gitlab.local
    if [[ "$current_url" != *"oauth2:"* ]]; then
      git remote set-url origin "https://oauth2:${GITLAB_PRIVATE_TOKEN}@git.mpi-cbg.de/globaloptim/globtimplots.git"
    fi
  fi
  git add .
  commit_msg="feat: Auto-commit development progress

ðŸ”„ Changes Summary:
- $file_count files modified/added
- Context: $CLAUDE_CONTEXT

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>"
  git commit -m "$commit_msg"
  git push
  echo "âœ… Auto-committed and pushed $file_count files"
fi
